sections.MISSION: 3/2CR Mortar Platoon conducts a land navigation course to prepare for the best mortar competition.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Familiarize soldiers with plotting and finding points during the day and night.
Complete thorough risk assessment.
Safe completion of platoon movement to and from the land navigation course.
Assessment of soldiers points and meeting the time hacks.
Recovery and stowage of all equipment used.
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
-Soldiers bring their own water source, map markers, compass, protractor and headlamps.
-Transport to range in LMTV/STRYKER.
-Vehicles dispatched Monday, 13MAR23.
-Squad leaders coordinate seats for their squad members.
-SSG Diaz coordinates 6x boxes MREs.
Uniform: OCP’s, ACH (for transportation) FLC, PC, WW gear, map, compass, protractor, headlamp, map markers and water source.
Events: First day iteration – 5 points, 3 hours, team
Second day iteration - 5 points, 3 hours, individual
Day into night iteration – 8 points, 5 hours, individual/team depending on
